abc/Week4.java

//package Hoc;

public class Week4 {

	public Week4() {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public static int max2Int(int a, int b) {
		return a>b?a:b;
	}
	public static int minArray(int[] arr)
	{
		int min=9999;
		for(int i=0;i<arr.length;i++)
			if(arr[i]<min) min=arr[i];
		return min;
	}
	public static String calculateBMI(double weight, double height)
	{
		double BMI=weight/(height*height);
		double x=((double)Math.round(BMI*10)/10);
		String s=new String();
		
if(x<18.5) s="Thiếu cân";
		else if(x>=18.5&&x<=22.9) s="Bình thường";
		else if(x>=23&&x<=24.9) s="Thừa cân";
		else if(x>=25) s="Béo phì";
		return s;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//System.out.println(calculateBMI(70, 1.70));
	}

}

abc/Week4Test.java

//package Hoc;

import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*;

import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;

class Week4Test {

	@Test
	public void testMax2Int1() {
	Week4 testint1=new Week4();
	int 
result=testint1.max2Int(4, 5);
	assertEquals(5, result);
	}
	@Test
	public void testMax2Int2() {
		Week4 testint2=new Week4();
		int 
result=testint2.max2Int(-3, 6);
		assertEquals(6, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMax2Int3() {
		Week4 testint3=new Week4();
		int 
result=testint3.max2Int(7, 3);
		assertEquals(7, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMax2Int4() {
		Week4 testint4=new Week4();
		int 
result=testint4.max2Int(7, -3);
		assertEquals(7, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMax2Int5() {
		Week4 testint5=new Week4();
		int 
result=testint5.max2Int(10, 15);
		assertEquals(15, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMinArray1(){
		int[] arr= {1,2,3,4,5};
		Week4 testarray1=new Week4();
		int 
result=testarray1.minArray(arr);
		assertEquals(1, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMinArray2(){
		int[] arr= {-3,4,-2,-5,7};
		Week4 testarray2=new Week4();
		int 
result=testarray2.minArray(arr);
		assertEquals(-5, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMinArray3(){
		int[] arr= {-1,-2,-3,-4,-5};
		Week4 testarray3=new Week4();
		int result=
testarray3.minArray(arr);
		assertEquals(-5, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMinArray4(){
		int[] arr= {5,2,7,4,9};
		Week4 testarray4=new Week4();
		int result=
testarray4.minArray(arr);
		assertEquals(2, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testMinArray5(){
		int[] arr= {1,2,3,4,5,-3,-6,6};
		Week4 testarray5=new Week4();
		int 
result=testarray5.minArray(arr);
		assertEquals(-6, result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testCalculateBMI1(){
		Week4 testBMI1=new Week4();
		String 
result=testBMI1.calculateBMI(50, 1.65);
		assertEquals("Thiếu cân", result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testCalculateBMI2(){
		Week4 testBMI2=new Week4();
		String result=testBMI2.calculateBMI(52, 1.65);
		assertEquals("Bình thường", result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testCalculateBMI3(){
		Week4 testBMI3=new Week4();
		String result=testBMI3.calculateBMI(48, 1.70);
		assertEquals("Thiếu cân", result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testCalculateBMI4(){
		Week4 testBMI4=new Week4();
		String result=testBMI4.calculateBMI(60, 1.40);
		assertEquals("Béo phì", result);
	}

	@Test
	public void testCalculateBMI5(){
		Week4 testBMI4=new Week4();
		String result=testBMI4.calculateBMI(70, 1.70);
		assertEquals("Thừa cân", result);
	}
}
